actions: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

name: Nezznar the Black Spider
traits: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.
Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls when he or his target is in sunlight.
